検事控訴: (けんじこうそ) - public prosecutor's appeal
検事総長: (けんじそうちょう) - attorney general
検体: (けんたい) - specimen; sample; object to be examined
検出力: (けんしゅつりょく) - statistical power; power
検出可能セグメント: (けんしゅつかのうセグメント) - detectable segment
検出可能要素: (けんしゅつかのうようそ) - detectable element
検出装置: (けんしゅつそうち) - detector; detecting device; detecting unit; sensing device
検収: (けんしゅう) - acceptance inspection; collating; receipt and inspection
検問所: (けんもんしょ) - check station; checkpoint
検図: (けんず) - drawing check; check of drawing
検定: (けんてい) - official certification; approval; inspection
検定教科書: (けんていきょうかしょ) - authorized textbook; authorised textbook
検定統計量: (けんていとうけいりょう) - test statistic
検定試験: (けんていしけん) - certification examination; licensing examination; licensure examination
検察側: (けんさつがわ) - {law}  the prosecution; prosecution side
検察審査会: (けんさつしんさかい) - Committee for the Inquest of Prosecution
検察庁: (けんさつちょう) - Public Prosecutor's Office
検屍: (けんし) - autopsy; inquest; investigation of death
検査: (kensa) - inspection (ex.: alfândega, fábrica), examination, scan (e.g. MRI, PET, etc.)
検査プログラム: (けんさプログラム) - checking program
検査係: (けんさがかり) - inspector; gauger; passer
検査官: (けんしょうかん) - inspector; examiner; auditor
検査所: (けんさじょ) - inspection station; inspection centre
検査手数料: (けんさてすうりょう) - inspection fee
検査法: (けんさほう) - method of examination or inspection
検査証明書: (けんさしょうめいしょ) - inspection certificate
検校: (けんぎょう) - correction; person who makes corrections; temple or shrine administrator
検案書: (けんあんしょ) - certificate of post-mortem
検死: (けんし) - autopsy; inquest; investigation of death
検番: (けんばん) - geisha call-office/assignation office for geisha; geisha on call
検番芸者: (けんばんげいしゃ) - geisha belonging to a call-office (usually a skilled geisha)
検真: (けんしん) - verification of the authenticity of a document (e.g. by seal or handwriting)
検算: (けんざん) - verification of accounts; checking figures; arithmetic check
検索: (kensaku) - looking up (por exemplo, uma palavra em um dicionário), retrieval (e.g. data), searching for, referring to
検索インタフェース: (けんさくインタフェース) - search interface
検索エンジン: (けんさくエンジン) - search engine
検索エンジンポジショニング: (けんさくエンジンポジショニング) - search engine positioning
検索エンジンマーケティング: (けんさくエンジンマーケティング) - search engine marketing
検索エンジン対策: (けんさくエンジンたいさく) - search engine optimization
検索ロボット: (けんさくロボット) - search robot
検索文字列: (けんさくもじれつ) - search string
検索時概念組合せ索引作業: (けんさくじがいねんくみあわせさくいんさぎょう) - post-coordinated indexing
検索条件: (けんさくじょうけん) - search criteria
検索機能: (けんさくきのう) - lookup function; search function
